title: National Poetry Day: Miriam Allott Creative Writing Fellow appointed (The University of Liverpool)
text: ( Source : The University of Liverpool ) Photo credit: Mark Vessey The University of Liverpool has appointed Next Generation Poet, Sean Borodale, as the new Miriam Allott Creative Writing Fellow. As part of his new role Sean will contribute to
